Body:
x = np.linspace(-100, 100, 1000)
y = 10 * np.exp(-(x ** 2 / (2 * 20 ** 2)))
asym_param = 1e-06 * np.ones(x.size)
als = AlsCvxopt(smoothness_param=1000.0, asym_param=asym_param, redux=1,
    fix_end_points=False, fix_rng=None, verbose=True)
y_als = als.calculate(y)
assert np.max((y - y_als)[250:750]) > 7
asym_param[200:800] = 0.01
als = AlsCvxopt(smoothness_param=1000.0, asym_param=asym_param, redux=1,
    fix_end_points=False, fix_rng=None, verbose=True)
y_als = als.calculate(y)
assert np.max((y - y_als)[250:750]) < 0.03
